sentences.en: Broderick was the most courageous man I ever met.
sentences.cn: 布罗德里克是我认识的最勇猛无比的人.

sentences.en: Courageous, staunch, true, he lived for his beliefs and now he died for them.
sentences.cn: 勇敢 、 坚定 、 忠实, 他过去为自己的信念而生,今天为此而死.

sentences.en: He was a very fine man, indeed I'll go further, he was the most courageous man I ever knew.
sentences.cn: 他是个非常好的人, 我甚至可以说, 他是我所知道的最有勇气的人.

sentences.en: He was roused to action by courageous words.
sentences.cn: 豪言壮语促使他奋起行动.

sentences.en: He was wrong, and courageous enough to admit it.
sentences.cn: 他是错了，而且有勇气承认自己错了。

sentences.en: He would be courageous calm and self assured, but neither pompous nor hypercritical.
sentences.cn: 他勇敢、冷静、自信, 既不傲慢,也不虚为.

sentences.en: It was a very frightening experience and they were very courageous.
sentences.cn: 那是一次让人胆战心惊的经历，而他们表现得非常勇敢。

sentences.en: It was courageous of her to go into the burning building to save the child.
sentences.cn: 她进入燃烧着的房屋去救那孩子是勇敢的.

sentences.en: Thanks to the exertions of a few sensible and courageous men, the compromise was accepted.
sentences.cn: 由于少数明智且勇敢的人的努力，折中方案被采纳了。

sentences.en: That was the extreme southern limit attained by the courageous traveller.
sentences.cn: 这就是那些勇敢的旅行者们走到的最南的地点.

sentences.en: We are no carpet soldiers, but courageous troops.
sentences.cn: 我们不是少爷兵, 而是英勇善战的勇士.

sentences.en: You're brave and courageous. You can make it.
sentences.cn: 你勇敢无畏，一定会获得成功。
